formElement.label: Chef-client Path:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path to the chef-client executable e.g /usr/bin/chef-client (This is the default value). (Required)

formElement.label: Configuration File:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path and name of the configuration file e.g /etc/chef/client.rb (This is the default value). (Required)

formElement.label: Chef Server URL:
formElement.documentation: Provide the URL of the Chef Server to use.

formElement.label: Node Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the node.

formElement.label: Replace Current Run List:
formElement.documentation: Provide a new run list items to place instead of the current run list.

formElement.label: JSON Attributes Definition:
formElement.documentation: Provide the JSON file or URL to load attributes from.

formElement.label: Daemonize:
formElement.documentation: If checked the process will be daemonized.

formElement.label: Interval(seconds):
formElement.documentation: Provide a interval in seconds for the chef-client to periodically run.

formElement.label: Log Level:
formElement.documentation: Choose the log level, available options are: Debug, Information, Warning, Error and Fatal.

formElement.label: Additional Commands:
formElement.documentation: Provide any additional commands if needed.
